CustomField.description: If true, does not use the metadata item's LastModifiedDate as a change indicator. For some metadata types like Profile and CustomValue, LastModifiedDate is either not reliable (Profile) or not available (CustomValue).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If true, does not use the metadata item's LastModifiedDate as a change indicator. For some metadata types like Profile and CustomValue, LastModifiedDate is either not reliable (Profile) or not available (CustomValue).
CustomField.label: Ignore LastModifiedDate
